EtaModelCC 1.0.1

Access the climate change data.

Source: R/climate.R
getClimateData.Rd

getClimateData access the climate change data from CPTEC/INPE.

getClimateData(modelID, modelFrequency, modelVar, lat, lon, iYear, fYear)

Arguments

modelID

numeric (model ID).
modelFrequency

string (data frequency).
modelVar

string (model variable short name).
lat

numeric (latitude coordenate).
lon

numeric (longitude coordenate).
iYear

numeric (initial year).
fYear

numeric (final year).

Value

list (list with climate change data)

Examples

getClimateData('1', 'YEARLY', 'TP2M', '-28.35', '-52.34', iYear = 2006, fYear = 2010)

#> $Model
#> [1] "Eta"
#> 
#> $Couple
#> [1] "MIROC5"
#> 
#> $Scenario
#> [1] "RCP4.5"
#> 
#> $Resolution
#> [1] "20"
#> 
#> $Frequency
#> [1] "YEARLY"
#> 
#> $Variable_name
#> [1] "TP2M"
#> 
#> $Variable_description
#> [1] "Temperatura do ar a 2 m"
#> 
#> $Latitude
#> [1] "-28.35"
#> 
#> $Longitude
#> [1] "-52.34"
#> 
#> $Data
#>   Year            Value
#> 1 2006 15.1026306152344
#> 2 2007 15.7372426986694
#> 3 2008 15.5500679016113
#> 4 2009 16.1214752197266
#> 5 2010 15.5250234603882
#>
